yes, there are some unique risks associated with using nutmeg oil in skincare products. nutmeg oil is a potent oil that should be used with caution. it should only be applied topically in extremely small doses, as it can cause skin irritation, burning, and redness. in some cases, it can cause allergic reactions or even sensitivities. additionally, nutmeg oil can be toxic when consumed in large quantities, so it should never be ingested. it is important to use nutmeg oil with caution and follow the recommended dosages when using it in skincare products. it is also recommended to do a patch test before using any new skincare product containing nutmeg oil to avoid potential adverse reactions.
